artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Iseya Kanekichi; Carved by Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of a woman looking toward PL, with open mouth; woman wears a green kimono with blue, yellow and pink flowers; landscape behind woman with mountain peaks and trees primarily in ULQ
marks: in the red rectangle: {[Kumagai nyōbō (wife) O??]} in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Ise's Poem and Kumagai's Wife
